Package com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.store

Package that contains functionality that implements access to the actual distributed data store.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AllowUndeletingUpdates
    Helper class that implements policy to allow "overwrites" of deleted entries, as long as new content appears to be same as deleted one, by content hash.
    EntryLastAccessed
    POJO for storing simple last-accessed timestamp, associated with one or more entries.
    ListLimits
    Argument container used for limiting details of listing entries (or names of entries).
    StoredEntry<K extends EntryKey>
    POJO for storing metadata for a single file entry.
    StoredEntryConverter<K extends EntryKey,E extends StoredEntry<K>,L extends ListItem>
    Converter used by store for handling conversions between low-level Storable (things stored in StoreMate store), and ClusterMate-level StoredEntry instances.
    StoreHandler<K extends EntryKey,E extends StoredEntry<K>,L extends ListItem>
    Class that handles coordination between front-end service layer (servlet, jax-rs) and back-end storage layer.
    StoreHandler.FullListItemsCallback  
    StoreHandler.ListItemsCallback  
    StoresImpl<K extends EntryKey,E extends StoredEntry<K>>  

Package com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.store Description

Package that contains functionality that implements access to the actual distributed data store. Functionality is usually called via front-end objects (Servlets, JAX-RS resources).
